description: HIS 5400 Key Advantage: DirectX 11 - Perfect for playing popular games online, the ATI Radeon HD 5450 offers full DirectX 11 support; ATI Stream - Accelerate demanding applications and do more than ever with your PC, Unleash the massive parallel processing power of your GPU to help speed up your PC; Home entertainment experience - give you stunning high definition entertainment from your PC, whether Blu-ray/HD DVD discs or other HD sources. Get an  amazing entertainment experience with DirectX 11 and Windows 7; Low Power Consumption - Consumes less than 20 watts under full load
title: HIS Radeon HD 5450 Silence 1 GB (64bit) DDR3 HDMI DL-DVI (HDCP) VGA PCI Express 2.1 16x Video Card Retail (RoHS) H545H1G
